current_session.summary: Live Trading Session #3: Framework Validation Day. Closed Trade #6 (-$44.02 loss) after framework triggered correctly but SPY continued higher. Rule #19 exit mechanics validated (3-candle hold prevented larger loss). Re-entered with Trade #7 at lower extension with tighter risk ($100 vs $200). Currently holding SPXU short (300 @ $12.45) overnight into FOMC Friday. FOMC binary event tomorrow 18:00 ET could validate/invalidate macro thesis.
